Article Title: Proof, not promises: New food products to get strict checks; FSSAI makes scientific evidence mandatory
Article Text:
FSSAI

Proof needed, not promises

NEW DELHI: When questions are raised about the safety of any food article, India's food regulator will now ask for proof, not promises. From what a product contains and how much Indians actually eat to whether it's safe over time, every claim will have to be backed by data to assess its safety.From Jan 1, 2026, Food Safety and Standards Authority of India ( FSSAI ) has made it mandatory for all submissions seeking a food safety review or changes in food standards to follow a single, standardised format supported by scientific evidence. The move comes after the regulator found that many past requests lacked basic data or a uniform structure, making proper risk assessment difficult.The new rule does not trigger an automatic re-examination of all foods already in the market. It applies only when a stakeholder approaches FSSAI seeking a scientific risk assessment - either for introducing a new product or reviewing an existing one. In such cases, the burden of proving safety will rest with the applicant.Under the new format, submissions must spell out nutritional information, how much Indians consume the product, results of toxicological studies, and evidence on safe intake limits, along with allergy risks and supporting scientific studies.The data will be reviewed by FSSAI's Science and Standards Division and assessed by expert panels, which will decide whether a product can be cleared, continued, restricted or subjected to tighter limits.Officials say the sharper focus on Indian eating habits is crucial as packaged foods become more common and overseas data may not reflect real exposure."This is an important step to protect public health. Earlier, many foods were approved using limited or incomplete information. Since Indian food habits, portion sizes and sensitivities are very different from those in other countries, asking for proper proof about long-term safety, how much people eat and possible allergy risks helps make food rules more practical, science-based and safer for Indian consumers," said Anjali Bhola, dietician at National Cancer Institute, Jhajjar, All India Institute of Medical Sciences.FSSAI has also assured stakeholders that data submitted for risk assessment will be treated as confidential and used only for scientific evaluation and policy decisions. For consumers, the message is simple: when food safety is questioned, evidence will now decide what stays on the plate.
Article Summary: Fssai has made it mandatory for all submissions seeking a food safety review or changes in food standards to follow a single, standardised format supported by scientific evidence. The move comes after the regulator found that many past requests lacked basic data or a uniform structure.

Article Title: Nobody feeling sorry for H-1Bs stuck in India: US immigration expert says companies are not waiting for them
Article Text:
Even if the stamp in the passport has expired, foreigners can still live and work in the US if they have valid immigration status

U.S. Rewrites H-1B Rules, Setback To Indian Workers; Check Who Is Eligible & Changes | WATCH





Immigration policy expert Rosemary Jenks said that it's ironic that Americans are made to feel sorry for Indian H-1B holders who are stranded at home due to a sudden delay in visa appointments, but no one in the US is feeling sorry for them. Companies are not waiting for them and are in fact going ahead to hire Americans, Jenks said, calling it a positive development for the US."Indians make up about 70% of H-1Bs, and many are now stranded in India while visas take longer. We‚Äôre supposed to feel sorry for them because it's taking longer for their visas to get approved," Jenks said, appearing on Steve Bannon's show. On the show, Bannon, a former aide of Donald Trump, called for a 10-year moratorium on all kinds of immigration.Jenks said that the social media vetting of these temporary visas that the Trump administration started is taking more time to ensure that people who are coming to the US are not coming to kill Americans or otherwise mess with the system. "Perfectly reasonable and rational," Jenks said, disparaging the narrative that Indians are 'stranded' in their own country because of the sudden delay."Nobody is feeling sorry for them here because, first of all, some of their employers apparently are deciding that it's too much trouble to wait for them and keep the jobs open for them and are potentially hiring Americans to do those jobs, we would hope," Jenks said."This would be a perfect time to say 'okay we are done, no more," Jenks said, supporting Bannon's moratorium proposal.The Indian government has raised the issue of visa delays with the US government but visa appointment dates are getting rescheduled to later part of 2026 and 2027 as the social media vetting has turned everything upside down.
Article Summary: Rosemary jenks says it's ironic that americans are made to feel sorry for indian h-1b holders who are stranded at home due to a sudden delay in visa appointments. Companies are not waiting for them and are in fact going ahead to hire americans, jenks said, calling it a positive development for the us.jenks said that the social media vetting of these temporary visas that the trump administration started is taking more time.

The deal allows his show to appear on Spotify, YouTube, and other platforms.Reports place the deal value at up to $250 million over several years. This includes licensing fees and ad revenue. His podcast brings in millions of viewers each episode on YouTube and other platforms, which adds steady income from ads and platform sharing.Before podcast success, Joe Rogan worked for the Ultimate Fighting Championship as a color commentator. Public pay reports show he earned tens of thousands of dollars per major event, adding up to around $1 million or more per year during active periods.He also continues to tour as a stand-up comic. While exact payouts were not shared, Rogan retained a stake and continues to earn from the brand.He also owns a large home in Austin, Texas, purchased for about $14 million, according to property records. Article Title: Iyo Sky net worth in 2025: WWE salary, Japan wrestling career, endorsements, and more
Article Text:
Iyo Sky (Image Source: Getty)

Iyo Sky‚Äôs WWE salary and contract growth

From Stardom to global star, Japan career and legacy earnings

Endorsements, merchandise, and net worth outlook in 2025

With the Japanese wrestling star now regularly in the main-event picture for WWE women, Iyo Sky's net worth in 2025 has been a popular conversation piece. Her earnings today, from championship bonuses to merchandise sales, attest to a career that has transitioned over time from cult fandom to global household name.Although numbers aren't released, the path from Japan's top promotions to WWE's biggest stages paints a picture of how the best wrestlers create generational wealth. Whether it be salary, bonuses, licensing fees, or the value of the brand she continues to create, all will impact her financial position in 2025.According to the report, Iyo Sky has built her earning potential significantly since signing with WWE and moving up the ranks from NXT to the main roster. Wrestlers of her stature usually earn a base salary, plus performance bonuses, pay-per-view bonuses, and a cut from merchandise sales. With observers estimating the annual WWE revenue at Sky in recent peaks to be at a mid-to-high six-figure amount, with recent high-profile title changes typically triggering renegotiated rights prices or bonus clauses.Individual contracts are not a matter of public record with WWE, but women‚Äôs champions find numbers on the high end of roster averages, applied through exposure and marketing value of a particular talent, although the far-appraised annual salary is difficult to determine.This places Sky in a strong negotiating position as WWE becomes her number one income source in 2025, and we're not talking her sole means of income.Sky made a name for herself in Japan prior to WWE, particularly in World Wonder Ring Stardom, where she was one of the promotion's defining talents. They were years that delivered long-lasting value to the brand as well as reliable income. Profits are still used to provide art for the calendars and T-shirts of the time, and continued popularity with fans in Japan contributes to her earnings from there too, despite her fully switching to the WWE a while ago.She gained a higher notoriety in foreign countries, which in turn made her transition into WWE a lot easier and money better! Analysts include these early career earnings in net-worth estimates, as well as the ongoing royalty checks, which, though small compared to her WWE pay today, add up over time.Outside of her wrestling pay, Sky also makes money from WWE merchandise, video games, and there have also been some brand deals here and there. For performers with stronger fan bases, such as champions who regularly appear on TV, merchandise royalties can add to significant sums. She also gets a cut of WWE's digital and licensing ecosystem that includes collectibles and gaming.Also Read: Roxanne Perez net worth in 2025: WWE earnings, contracts, endorsements, brand deals, and rising career

Article Title: Is Belle Delphine alive? YouTuber death claim spreads after viral tweet resurfaces old twomad cosplay photo
Article Text:
Is Belle Delphine alive? YouTuber death claim spreads after viral tweet resurfaces old twomad cosplay photo (Image via Getty)

Belle Delphine and twomad‚Äôs 2022 collaboration resurfaces after viral tweet







Belle Delphine is alive. A viral post on X confused many people, but the claim about her death is not true. The rumor started after an old photo of Belle Delphine and YouTuber twomad began trending again on Monday, December 29. The image was shared by the X account @LostMemeArchive with the caption, ‚Äúthis did not age well at all.‚ÄùSoon after, another user, @neo_jery, quote-posted the image and wrote, ‚Äúnotice how everyone in this image is dead.‚Äù That single line caused panic online. Many users believed both people in the photo had passed away.However, X later added a Community Note to the post to clear the confusion. The note said, ‚ÄúWhile the poster is correct about the death of Twomad (on right), Belle Delphine (on left) is still alive and active to this day.‚ÄùThe facts are clear. Twomad died in February 2024 at the age of 23. Belle Delphine is alive and has been fully active on social media. She is sharing posts as recently as last week. No news outlet has reported her death. The viral claim is false and misleading.Belle Delphine, whose real name is Mary-Belle Kirschner, became famous online for her cosplay style and bold internet persona. She first went viral in 2019 after selling her bath water for $30 a bottle, a move that shocked and amused the internet.On June 23, 2022, Belle Delphine shared photos from a collaboration with YouTuber twomad, whose real name was Muudea Sedik. The pictures showed them dressed as Buzz Lightyear and Woody from Toy Story. The shoot took place in a hotel room and featured playful poses. Belle Delphine captioned the post, ‚ÄúHosting the paralympics in a hotel room was weird‚Ä¶‚ÄùTwomad was best known for gaming videos and comedy skits. Because of that, the collaboration surprised many of his fans. Some questioned the pairing and shared mixed reactions online. Later, a second set of images from the same shoot showed twomad dressed as Donkey Kong, while Belle Delphine appeared as Princess Peach from the Mario franchise.After Twomad's death in 2024, these photos began circulating again. Twomad was found dead in his Los Angeles apartment during a wellness check. Since then, old posts linked to him have resurfaced, leading to false claims. Despite the rumors, Belle Delphine remains alive, active, and unaffected by the viral hoax.Also Read: Who Is Nick Shirley? YouTuber Accused Of Exposing Minnesota Daycare Fraud In Trending Investigation
Article Summary: Belle delphine is alive and has been fully active on social media. The rumor started after an old photo of her and twomad began trending again. Twomad died in february 2024 at the age of 23. No news outlet has reported her death.

Article Title: Erika Hammond and Ankur Jain combined net worth in 2025: WWE NXT career, business ventures, luxury lifestyle, and more

Erika Hammond and Ankur Jain (Image Source: Instagram)

Ankur Jain‚Äôs fintech empire and the couple‚Äôs combined net worth

In 2025, Erika Hammond and Ankur Jain are one of the most followed couples in the world of business and pop culture. Both of them from outlandishly opposing worlds: professional wrestling and boutique fitness versus billion-dollar fintech renovation. The shift from WWE talent to fitness entrepreneur for Hammond, along with Jain establishing himself as a technology founder, sparked public interest in the two's careers and wallets.Interest has only intensified since their over-the-top nuptials and globetrotting antics. Although the couple is known for keeping personal finances private, various industry estimates and business valuations indicate their combined net worth comfortably nears some of the most elite high-net-worth households, with most of the wealth attributable to Jain's tech companies and much of the remainder from Hammond's fitness, branding, and creator economy income.Erika Hammond appeared on the national scene first as a performer as Veronica Lane in WWE NXT, as well as in media and announcing roles during that time. Her wrestling career, while rather short, lent her some visibility and greater name recognition, along with other contacts that would prove useful post-wrestling.Hammond moved into the emerging boutique fitness space after leaving WWE. She eventually became one of Rumble Boxing's founding trainers in New York before evolving her own fitness concepts that included boxing-inspired HIIT and strength training programs.These businesses established her as a name in the high-end fitness community, enabling her to monetize in-person sessions, video workouts, brand partnerships, and social media. Her net worth in a 2025 breakdown is not found individually, but she earns like a modern fitness millionaire based on her own narrative rather than the days of sports contracts.Ankur Jain is the founder/CEO at Bilt Rewards, a fintech platform allowing consumers to earn rewards on rent & daily spend. The company has since gained significant partnerships and investors during its time there, with its valuation in the multi-billion-dollar range. Bilt is also the bedrock of Jain's personal wealth. Jain has an equity stake in Bilt.Depending on company valuation and market conditions, business media estimates Jain‚Äôs net worth in 2025 to be about $1.2 billion. When her wealth is added to Hammond's own fitness-related income and branding, the pair are labelled a hundred-million-dollar couple. Implanting an impression of luxurious life with expensive properties, six-star traveling, and glamorous parties brought by this memoir billionaire exemplifies that new technology entrepreneurship and personal brand are the two keys to wealth in the 21st century.Also Read: Who is The Boogeyman‚Äôs wife? Personal details, relationship timeline, and more

The shift from wwe talent to fitness entrepreneur for hammond, along with jain establishing himself as a technology founder, sparked public interest in the two's careers and wallets.

Article Title: Elon Musk's net worth: The world's richest man becomes the first ever with $600 billion worth amid SpaceX's valuation surge
Article Text:
Source: Forbes

'US Benefited Immensely From Indians', Says Tesla CEO Elon Musk, Warns US Against Scrapping H-1B

Elon Musk becomes the first person to hit a whopping figure of $600 billion in net worth





Elon Musk‚Äôs wealth surge driven by SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI





SpaceX





Tesla

xAI

Elon Musk‚Äôs rapid rise: From $24 billion to the brink of trillionaire status









Elon Musk has reached a historical financial milestone, as he has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion, as reported in Forbes magazine. This milestone has been achieved during a time when there is newfound interest in his privately owned rocket company, SpaceX, which he believes will make a historical initial start detailing a whopping value of $800 billion with an initial public offering that could potentially take place in 2026.Musk's net worth has not only increased with his involvement with his rocket company, SpaceX, but he has earned a tremendous amount of money with his investment in electric cars with his company, Tesla, where his net worth has increased by a whopping 12% because of his investment in his own artificial intelligence company, xAI.As reported by Forbes, Elon Musk has now broken yet another record by being the first individual to ever reach a net worth of over $600 billion. This achievement has come at a time when his private rocket company, SpaceX, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026. Musk's net worth is also contributed by his stake of 12% in Tesla, an electric vehicle behemoth, and his artificial intelligence company, xAI, both of which keep increasing in value.From groundbreaking innovations in space travel and electric mobility to ambitious AI projects, futuristic ventures, and global business expansions, Musk‚Äôs diversified portfolio and relentless pursuit of technological advancement have cemented his status as the world‚Äôs richest person.SpaceX has also showcased its role in the increasing wealth of Musk to historic levels. With an estimated 42% stake in the firm, the net worth of Musk is expected to grow by an enormous $168 billion if SpaceX continues to retain its current valuation of $800 billion. Analysts also expect it to reach a valuation of $1.5 trillion when it comes to the public market and possibly become the first trillionaire in the world. The innovative nature of SpaceX in terms of its rocket and satellite launches continues to impress the market while affecting the net worth of its CEO.Tesla stock is still an integral part of Musk‚Äôs financial network. His current stake of about 12% in Tesla is valued at $197 billion without taking into consideration the stock options from the 2018 CEO Performance Award that are still winding their way through litigation. Apart from that, Tesla shareholders have just approved what is considered the largest compensation deal of $1 trillion that is pegged on meeting various performance goals, including doubling the current market capitalization eightfold in ten years.Musk‚Äôs AI company, xAI, is also a significant contributor to his net worth. In the advanced talk of raising funding worth $15 billion in fresh equity, the firm is placed at a value of $230 billion. Musk owns about 53% of the firm‚Äôs stakes under xAI Holdings, meaning he has a net worth of about $60 billion. AI is another major sector into which Musk has ventured.Musk's emergence to $600 billion in a short span of time can be noted. He started with $24.6 billion in March 2020 and broke the $100 billion mark later in the same year, and reached $190 billion in January 2021. He broke many records in the last five years with his wealth and became the first person to break $500 billion in October 2025. At present, he leads the richest people in the world by a very large margin of $425 billion over Google co-founder Larry Page and is soon to reach $700 billion.
Article Summary: Elon musk has become the first-ever person to ever achieve a net worth that surpasses the whopping figure of $600 billion. His private rocket company, spacex, has seen a tremendous rise in market value, with plans of an initial public offering in 2026.

Article Title: Alex Rodriguez and Jaclyn Cordeiro combined net worth in 2025: Inside the former MLB star and fitness coach‚Äôs wealth, earnings, and love story

already that if there was to be another delay, people will probably stop caring about its release even more. If

Rockstar

Games delay GTA 6 again then the hype around the game will die down almost completely. Right now, nobody is searching for GTA 6. Everyone knows there‚Äôs no news, there‚Äôs nothing to talk about‚Ä¶ There‚Äôs a point to where you delay something so much that you start to make people angry.‚Äù

‚ÄúPeople aren‚Äôt itching to find new details or a latest leak anymore, they‚Äôre over it. They are thinking, ‚Äòit will come out when it comes out‚Äô, as they‚Äôre so burnt out from thinking it will come out soon and then it doesn‚Äôt‚Ä¶ And then they‚Äôre like, ‚ÄòOK, whatever‚Ä¶‚Äô‚Äù

Why Ex-Rockstar developer thinks Rockstar has been delaying the game

‚ÄúIf I know Rockstar Games, and I know the guys over there, one of the reasons for the delay in releasing GTA 6 is because they‚Äôre trying to make it look as best as it can possibly be. They‚Äôre polishing stuff.

I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôre completely finished with the game, given how much is on the line and how big everyone‚Äôs expectations are for it.‚Äù

‚ÄúI think the game will be released in November 2026 as it‚Äôs a good time for the game to come out for Rockstar for multiple reasons to sell video games. If you want to sell a big amount of video games then that‚Äôs the perfect time for GTA 6 to come out with it being a month before Christmas. Usually companies only delay these things once or twice when they need to, so I think it will come out around that time,‚Äù





Former Rockstar Games developer Mike York has a critical warning for the Take-Two-owned gaming studio. He has warned that the hype and public interest around Grand Theft Auto 6 will ‚Äúdie down‚Äù almost completely if the game faces any more delays. In an interview with Esports Insider (as seen by Dexerto), York said:York cited fan reactions showing growing frustration, with some saying they ‚Äúdon‚Äôt even care anymore‚Äù because repeated delays keep letting them down.he added.The game‚Äôs delay from May to November 2026 even caused anger in Poland‚Äôs parliament, with an opposition lawmaker calling the postponement ‚Äúa huge scandal‚Äù during a session.Explaining Rockstar‚Äôs reason behind GTA 6 delay, York said:York believes Rockstar is aiming to meet very high internal standards and may not feel it has reached that level yet.York noted.Till date, Rockstar has released two official trailers of the highly anticiapted game which have confirmed that GTA 6 is set in a modern Vice City. The game will feature dual protagonists, deeper RPG systems, realistic physics, new heist tools and a more evolving open world.Rockstar has not announced the official price for India. However, early industry estimates suggest the standard edition may be priced around ‚Çπ9,000, which is much higher than GTA V‚Äôs console launch price of ‚Çπ3,499.
Article Summary: Former rockstar developer mike york warns that further delays to grand theft auto 6 could significantly diminish public interest. He believes rockstar is prioritizing polish to meet high expectations, but prolonged waits risk alienating fans. York anticipates a november 2026 release, citing it as an optimal period for sales.

Article Title: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu responds to user asking about Arattai app: ‚ÄòWe will market it ‚Ä¶‚Äô
Article Text:
Arattai app: Features and challenges

One-to-one and group chats with text, voice notes, and media sharing

Audio and video calls with end-to-end encryption

Multi-device support, including desktop and Android TV apps

Stories and channels for broadcasting updates



Arattai app gets end-to-end encryption







Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu was recently asked by an X (formerly Twitter) user why there is no talk about Arattai now? The user quoted a post stating that Telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. Responding to the user‚Äôs question, Vembu shared that the company is doing ‚Äúupdates weekly‚Äù and is working on ‚Äúsome very important features‚Äù. ‚ÄúWe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù Vembu posted, adding ‚ÄúThis is a marathon. We are geared for it.‚ÄùTo recall, the Arattai app debuted in 2021 as a rival to Meta‚Äôs WhatsApp. Years after its launch, the app recently gained momentum after senior government ministers like Piyush Goyal joined the platform. In September this year, Arattai (meaning chat in Tamil) topped App Store ranking, registering 3,50,000 signs in just three days.Arattai offers familiar features such as:However, the app is still ironing out issues. Users have reported OTP delays, slower contact sync, and call glitches due to server overload.Last month, the company rolled out system-wide end-to-end encryption on the Arattai app. Announcing the release in an X post, Vembu then said that it is a ‚Äúforced upgrade on all because it is a drastic change‚Äù.‚ÄúWe had to do some redesign around it and we wanted extensive testing because it is a drastic change. It is now being tested by about 6,000 people in the company. We identified some issues and have fixed them. We are doing one more round of testing on a new build that has fixed the issues identified,‚Äù he then said.
Article Summary: Zoho founder sridhar vembu was recently asked by an x (formerly twitter) user why there is no talk about arattai now. The user quoted a post stating that telegram is worth $30 billion with only 30 employees working from home, no office. ‚Äúwe will market it more once we feel we are satisfied with the feature set!,‚Äù vem bu posted, adding ‚Äúthis is a marathon.

Article Title: Vince Zampella, Battlefield chief and Call of Duty co-creator, killed in car accident at 55
Article Text:
Gaming icon Vince Zampella, the visionary behind Call of Duty and leader of Battlefield, tragically passed away at 55 in a car accident. Zampella's career defined modern shooters, co-founding Infinity Ward and later Respawn Entertainment, delivering hits like Apex Legends. His influence on interactive entertainment and inspiration to millions is widely mourned.

Legacy built on Battlefield revival and first-person shooter innovation

‚ÄòCall of Duty‚Äô Creator Vince Zampella Dies In Horrific Highway Crash Caught On Camera

Gaming community mourns visionary Developer who shaped modern shooters





Vince Zampella, the gaming industry titan behind the blockbuster Call of Duty franchise and leader of the Battlefield series, died Sunday in a single-vehicle crash on Angeles Crest Highway near Los Angeles. He was 55. The Ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m., struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire, according to California Highway Patrol reports. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital. Authorities have not confirmed whether alcohol or drugs were factors in the crash.Zampella's career defined modern military shooters. He co-founded Infinity Ward in 2002, where he spearheaded the original Call of Duty in 2003‚Äîa World War II game that evolved into one of gaming's most successful franchises. The series has sold over 500 million copies globally and generated more than $30 billion in revenue.After his contentious 2010 departure from Activision and subsequent legal settlement, Zampella established Respawn Entertainment. The studio delivered critically acclaimed titles including Titanfall, Apex Legends, and the Star Wars Jedi series. Electronic Arts acquired Respawn in 2013, and in 2021, tasked Zampella with revitalizing the struggling Battlefield franchise‚Äîculminating in this year's well-received Battlefield 6."This is an unimaginable loss," Electronic Arts stated Monday. "Vince's influence on the video game industry was profound and far-reaching. His work helped shape modern interactive entertainment and inspired millions of players and developers around the world."Game Awards founder Geoff Keighley called Zampella "an extraordinary person‚Äîa gamer at heart, but also a visionary executive with a rare ability to recognize talent." He added that while Zampella created some of gaming's most influential titles, "I always felt he still had his greatest one ahead of him."A Paramount Pictures live-action Call of Duty film remains in production, ensuring Zampella's creative vision will continue reaching new audiences.
Article Summary: Vince zampella, the visionary behind call of duty and leader of battlefield, died sunday in a car accident. The ferrari he was driving veered off the winding mountain road around 12:45 p.m. struck a concrete barrier, and caught fire. A passenger in the vehicle was ejected and later died at a hospital.

Article Title: New Year 2026: How to use WhatsApp new year stickers, video call effects and other features to make your celebrations more fun
Article Text:
How WhatsApp's new features can make your New Year celebrations more memorable



WhatsApp New Year stickers pack 2026



Steps to use the

2026 Sticker Pack

:

Go to any individual or group chat.

Click the emoji icon in the text area.

Switch to the Sticker tab (square icon w/ folded corner).

Scroll down until you see the 2026 pack of stickers or click ‚Äú+‚Äù to download.

- Tapping any sticker will instantly send the sticker to the chat box.

Use with text to create personalised New Year greetings.

Add video call effects



Usage of video call effects:

Begin a video call in a one-on-one or group setting.

Tap the ‚Äúeffects‚Äù icon on your screen (sparkle or magic wand).

Choose the available effects: firework, confetti, or stars.

Adjust the intensity or turn the effects on/off.

Enjoy your New Year call with additional graphic festivities.

Celebrate with animated confetti reactions



How to use animated confetti reactions

Open the conversation and choose the message to which you want to respond.

Tap and hold the message until the reaction menu appears.

See animated confetti appearing on the screen for all chat members.

Enhance status updates with animated stickers



How to use:

Open WhatsApp and switch to the ‚ÄúStatus‚Äù page.

Touch ‚ÄúMy Status‚Äù and choose a picture or video to set as the background.

Click the sticker icon on the top menu bar.

Select animated stickers, including the 2026 festive pack.

The sticker will change size and position by pinching or dragging.

Post your Status to share with all your contacts.

Tips for a smooth New Year celebration on WhatsApp



Start early: Make plans for the group messages and events. Avoid doing everything last-minute.

Control the number of people in a video call: If there are too many people in a video call, it may slow the connection speed.

Combine features: Use stickers, confetti reactions, and status updates all at once.

Keep it personal: Record personal voice messages or videos for friends who cannot be present in person. Notifications: Notify Notifications: Pin important messages so no one misses critical updates about timings or locations.

Safety tips: Share your live location with trusted friends and family only.





New Year's Eve is just around the corner, and is ready to knock at your door. With billions of messages and calls spreading across family, friends, and loved ones around the world Right from online get-togethers to exciting group messages, WhatsApp has a very important role to perform in enabling people to celebrate and share their New Year messages. This time around, WhatsApp has come up with party-themed features such as a 2026 sticker package, video call effects, animated confetti reactions, and animated status stickers to make celebrations more interactive and exciting. Below is a step-by-step guide to make use of these features in an effective way to make the New Year celebrations memorable for you.Sticker messages are a great way of expressing emotions and wishes through fun stickers. The 2026 WhatsApp sticker set is made exclusively for the New Year. It will help the user express the feelings of celebration.Adding some stickers to the message gives the message an added touch of festivities and playfulness, especially when the message contains greetings to more than one friend or family member at the same timeVideo calling features prominently in virtual celebrations, mainly in the case of friends or family members who live in distant places.It makes online meetings very lively and interesting with energy and a festive feel.Animated confetti reactions let you instantly respond to messages or announcements with a visual celebration, enhancing interaction in chats.This is perfect for emphasising important events such as countdown messages of invitations to parties or celebrations and fun messages that bring smiles without requiring the user to type out a message,‚Äù states the designer.WhatsApp now allows animated stickers on Status updates, allowing users to share greetings or celebrations with movement, giving messages a dynamic touch.This serves to assist users in extending Happy New Year messages to their friends, even if they are not in their personal conversations.
Article Summary: How whatsapp's new features can make your new year celebrations more memorable. Tapping any sticker will instantly send the sticker to the chat box. Use with text to create personalised new year greetings. Add video call effects: firework, confetti, or stars.

Article Title: Before becoming Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadella faced the 'One rejection' Indian students fear most
Article Text:
Microsoft CEO 'Thrilled' About India's Growing Data Centre Capacity, Details Meet With PM Modi

Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella‚Äôs joinery from Manipal





Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella once shared his experience of how not going to IIT which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The IIT rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the CEO of Microsoft, one of the world‚Äôs most valuable companies. Speaking to LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky in 2023, Nadella revealed that as a teenage in Hyderabad his ambition revolved around cricket and banking. He said that he never thought of software. Nadella further added that like many of friends he also viewed IIT as the pinnacle of academic achievement. But when he failed to secure admission, Nadella faced a setback that could have easily defined his future. Instead, it became the catalyst for a different journey.Nadella described IIT as ‚Äúthe holy grail‚Äù for middle-class students, acknowledging the weight of expectations. Yet, he later reflected that not getting in forced him to explore other opportunities ones that ultimately shaped his resilience and adaptability.After getting rejected from IIT, Nadella got enrolled at the Manipal Institute of Technology, where he studied electrical engineering. The decision of taking admission in Manipal Institute of Technology set him on a trajectory that would take him to the University of Wisconsin‚ÄìMilwaukee for a master‚Äôs degree.After completing his masters he enrolled in the University of Chicago for an MBA.Nadella also recalled that after reaching the US he faced cultural shocks, homesickness and the challenge of proving himself in a new country. He said that he often joked about the fact that he simply cannot locate Milwaukee on a map before moving there. However, all these experiences helped him in building adaptability which later went ahead and defined his leadership style.Nadella joined Microsoft in 1992, after working at Sun Microsystems. Over, the next two decade he rose steadily through the ranks and the became the Microsoft CEO in 2014. When Nadella became the CEO, the company was facing a lot competition from Apple, Google and Amazon. However, under his leadership, Microsoft reinvented itself and it now a market valuation of $3.54 trillion.Nadella has often said that ‚Äúonly in America would someone like me get the chance to prove himself rather than be typecast based on the school I attended.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft ceo satya nadella once shared his experience of how not going to iit which he describes as the "the holy grail" for middle-class students became a turning point for him. The iit rejection redirected his life towards a path only few could have imagined and which eventually led him to become the ceo of microsoft.

Article Title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg's 'highest-paid' employee is reportedly unhappy with his Boss, feels he ...
Article Text:
Mark Zuckerberg (File Image)

Alexandr Wang is reportedly clashing with Meta‚Äôs old guard

Meta‚Äôs Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More

Alexandr Wang memo on Meta's massive AI restructure





In June this year, Facebook-parent Meta Platforms agreed to take a 49% stake in artificial intelligence (AI) startup Scale AI for $14.8 billion. As part of the deal, Scale AI CEO Alexandr Wang took top position inside Meta, leading the company's new ‚Äúsuperintelligence‚Äù lab, , Meta Superintelligence Labs, or MSL. The 28-year-old founder of Scale AI, Wang has been installed as the public face of Zuckerberg‚Äôs AI reboot. Mark Zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire AI prodigy Alexandr Wang on board. However, it reportedly seems that all is not well between the AI wunderkind and his Boss, Mark Zuckerberg. The 41-year-old Zuckerberg is said to have backed his new hires with nine-figure compensation packages to lure top researchers from rivals, igniting a Silicon Valley poaching war.According to a report in Financial Times, Wang privately believes that CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs micromanagement of the company‚Äôs AI push is "suffocating". Wang is said to have complained to associates that Zuckerberg‚Äôs tight grip on the effort is stifling progress, the report said, citing multiple people familiar with the situation. Report adds that cracks have begun to emerge at an executive level and that tensions have been bubbling between Wang and Zuckerberg for sometime now.As per the report, internally, some staff question whether Wang is out of his depth, given his lack of experience managing teams in a large corporation but also his expertise in AI data services rather than as an AI researcher pushing technical breakthroughs.Incidentally, Alexander Wang‚Äôs arrival at Meta has created friction over the company's fundamental approach to AI development, with his superintelligence team pushing to make the company‚Äôs next model ‚Äúclosed‚Äù ‚Äî keeping its technology secret. This is said to mark a major departure from Meta‚Äôs longtime philosophy of open-sourcing its models for other developers to build upon, causing some old guard members to chafe at the change, the Times reported.The new leadership has chosen to abandon Meta‚Äôs previous frontier model called Behemoth, which saw its release delayed last spring after disappointing performance tests. Meta‚Äôs AI division faces a dramatic four-way split as Meta reorganizes into groups focused on research, superintelligence development, products, and infrastructure, according to the report.As the new vision and leadership have crystallised, some top names have left. Among them, in recent weeks, Meta‚Äôs longtime chief legal officer Jennifer Newstead was poached by arch-rival Apple, while chief revenue officer John Hegeman announced he too was leaving to launch a start-up.Similarly, chief AI scientist and Turing Award winner Yann LeCun is departing Meta to launch a new AI initiative. He had reportedly taken exception at having to report to Wang. Another reason cited for his resignation is that his longer-term research was reportedly hit hard by the recent cuts announced at Meta.Meta reorganized its AI teams in June this year. The memo said that most team leaders will report directly to 28-year-old Wang. This included investor and former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman, who heads MSL's product team and was announced as an MSL leader alongside Wang in June. In the email sent to employees, Wang wrote that "superintelligence is coming," and to "take it seriously," Meta needs to make major changes. This includes establishing four distinct teams that focus on research, training, products, and infrastructure.The reorganisation is the latest in a series of AI reorgs for Meta. Incidentally, Meta had already dissolved two major AI teams in the past six months.
Article Summary: Alexandr wang is reportedly clashing with meta‚Äôs old guard. Mark zuckerberg reportedly paid billions to bring billionaire ai prodigy alexandr wang on board. Wang is said to have complained to associates that zuckerberg's tight grip on the effort is stifling progress.

Article Title: NYT Connections today‚Äôs hints and answers (#933) for 30 December 2025
Article Text:
What is NYT Connections





NYT Connections: Hints for today‚Äôs puzzle

NYT Connections: Common FAQs



How to play NYT Connections?

Are hints available?

Can I play the NYT Connections game for free?

What skills does the game enhance?





The New York Times‚Äô Connections has quickly risen to a favourites list for word game enthusiasts, fusing the addictive elegance of word games such as Wordle with more complex puzzles in the realms of logic and pattern recognition. Daily, players are offered a collection of 16 apparently random words, placed in a 4x4 matrix, which must be grouped into four different thematically consistent sets, requiring a solution that relies on the discovery of often subtle connections, ties, and wordplay. Puzzle enthusiasts seeking a challenging and informative solution will find the December 30, 2025 issue, game number 933, to offer a perfect balance of knowledge and intellect. Connections remains a continuing source of fascination for an international following, a daily challenge for intellectual acuity and mental dexterity.NYT Connections is a very engaging word association game aimed at evaluating the ability to use analytical thinking and logic when problem-solving. In contrast to a normal word game, playing this game requires the ability to distinguish very subtle connections between the words associated with the game, ranging from very straightforward connections to very abstract ones.The game can be played for free through desktop or mobile operating systems on any device at the convenience of the players. Due to the easy-to-grasp game mechanics and the very challenging puzzles required in the game, many people actually make the game a daily routine for themselves.To help players without revealing the solution, here are some strategies for December 30, 2025:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Here are the connection categories available today in the NYT Connections puzzle:Below are the four correct groups for today‚Äôs puzzle.The word choices are arranged in a 4x4 matrix. Find connections between the words to categorize them into four appropriate groups.Yes, the game offers subtle clues so as not to pamper the players.It is also free to download for mobile and computer usage.It improves pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral thinking, and problem-solving abilities.
Article Summary: Nyt connections is a word association game aimed at evaluating the ability to use analytical thinking and logic when problem-solving. Daily, players are offered a collection of 16 apparently random words, placed in a 4x4 matrix. Find connections between the words to categorize them into four appropriate groups.

Article Title: Meet Google executive 'responsible' for Sam Altman sending 'Code Red' to OpenAI employees
Article Text:
Google's Josh Woodward has jolted OpenAI, forcing a 'code red' with his Gemini app's rapid success. Gemini's user growth and image generation capabilities have challenged ChatGPT's dominance, leading to a significant shift in the AI landscape. Woodward's ability to cut through bureaucracy and his team's innovative approach are credited for Google's AI resurgence, impacting Alphabet's stock and OpenAI's strategic plans.

OpenAI's Master Plan for India

The numbers tell a brutal story for ChatGPT

The secret weapon: Breaking Google's legendary bureaucracy





Josh Woodward isn't a household name in Silicon Valley, but the 42-year-old Google veteran has accomplished what seemed impossible just months ago‚Äîhe's made the world's most powerful AI company sweat. The executive leading Google's Gemini app triggered such alarm at OpenAI that CEO Sam Altman declared an internal "code red" in early December, forcing the startup to abandon lucrative projects and scramble to defend its eroding market position.Woodward's impact has been devastating for OpenAI. Since taking charge of the Gemini app in April while simultaneously running Google Labs, he's orchestrated a comeback that's transformed Google from AI afterthought to existential threat. His team's viral Nano Banana image generator crashed Google's own infrastructure in August, generating so much traffic that the company's custom AI chips nearly "melted," according to CNBC reports from a November all-hands meeting.Google's resurgence under Woodward's leadership has fundamentally rewritten the competitive landscape. Gemini's monthly active users grew from 350 million in March to 650 million by October, coming close to ChatGPT's 800 million weekly users. By September, Gemini had dethroned ChatGPT atop Apple's App Store after generating 5 billion images.The impact runs deeper than raw user counts. Data from Similarweb reveals that Gemini has more than tripled its share of generative AI web traffic over the past 12 months, surging from 5.4% to 18.2%.This gain came directly at ChatGPT's expense‚ÄîOpenAI's flagship product plummeted from commanding 87.2% market share to just 68%, a staggering 19-point drop.The blow came in late November when Google announced Gemini 3, a LLM model that outperformed OpenAI's flagship products on industry benchmarks and sent Alphabet's stock soaring. Within days, Altman issued his "code red" memo, delaying OpenAI's planned advertising business, e-commerce expansion, and AI agent development to pour resources into improving ChatGPT's core experience. The desperation was palpable‚Äîthis was OpenAI's most decisive admission yet of the competitive pressure threatening its $500 billion valuation.Woodward's success stems from an unusual talent in Google's notoriously slow-moving culture. Colleagues told CNBC he's mastered the art of demolishing bureaucratic barriers through systems like "block," where employees flag roadblocks for his team to immediately resolve. Former Google Labs co-lead Clay Bavor says Woodward's ability to "move fast, break down barriers and execute" has landed him "right at the center of the most important work at Google. "His track record speaks volumes. NotebookLM became an instant hit after its July 2023 launch. His quarterly newsletter grew so influential that Google executives routinely seek his reading recommendations. He responds directly to user complaints on X and Reddit, bringing feedback to engineers for rapid fixes‚Äîa level of user engagement that's helped Gemini gain trust and momentum.OpenAI fired back earlier this month with GPT-5.2, claiming benchmark superiority once again. But Woodward holds structural advantages that terrify OpenAI: Google's massive cash reserves, custom AI chips, and nine products with over 1 billion users each. While OpenAI burns through funding rounds to survive, Woodward's operation runs on profits from YouTube and search. Alphabet's 62% stock surge in 2025 outpaced all megacap peers‚Äîa dramatic reversal from its brutal first quarter that vindicated Woodward's strategy.
Article Summary: Google's josh woodward has jolted openai, forcing a 'code red' with his gemini app's rapid success. Gemini's user growth and image generation capabilities have challenged chatgpt's dominance. Woodward's ability to cut through bureaucracy and his team's innovative approach are credited for google's ai resurgence.
